# aci_port_security_interface_policy #

Manages ACI Port Security Interface Policy



## API Information ##

* Class: [l2PortSecurityPol](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/l2PortSecurityPol/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 2.0(1m) and later.

* Distinguished Name Format: `uni/infra/portsecurityP-{name}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Fabric -> Access Policies -> Policies -> Interface -> Port Security`

## Example Usage ##

The configuration snippet below creates a Port Security Interface Policy with only required attributes.

```hcl

resource "aci_port_security_interface_policy" "example" {
  name = "test_name"
}

```
The configuration snippet below shows all possible attributes of the Port Security Interface Policy.

!> This example might not be valid configuration and is only used to show all possible attributes.

```hcl

resource "aci_port_security_interface_policy" "full_example" {
  annotation        = "annotation"
  description       = "description_1"
  maximum_endpoints = "10101"
  name              = "test_name"
  name_alias        = "name_alias_1"
  owner_key         = "owner_key_1"
  owner_tag         = "owner_tag_1"
  timeout           = "3200"
  violation_action  = "protect"
  annotations = [
    {
      key   = "key_0"
      value = "value_1"
    }
  ]
  tags = [
    {
      key   = "key_0"
      value = "value_1"
    }
  ]
}

```

All examples for the Port Security Interface Policy resource can be found in the [examples](https://github.com/CiscoDevNet/terraform-provider-aci/tree/master/examples/resources/aci_port_security_interface_policy) folder.

## Schema ##

### Required ###

* `name` (name) - (string) The name of the Port Security Interface Policy object.

### Read-Only ###

* `id` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the Port Security Interface Policy object.

### Optional ###

* `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the Port Security Interface Policy object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  - Default: `"orchestrator:terraform"`
* `description` (descr) - (string) The description of the Port Security Interface Policy object.
* `maximum_endpoints` (maximum) - (string) The maximum endpoints for the Port Security Interface Policy object. The value must be in the range 0 - 12000.
  - Default: `"0"`
* `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the Port Security Interface Policy object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
* `owner_key` (ownerKey) - (string) The key for enabling clients to own their data for entity correlation.
* `owner_tag` (ownerTag) - (string) A tag for enabling clients to add their own data. For example, to indicate who created this object.
* `timeout` (timeout) - (string) The timeout of the Port Security Interface Policy object. The value must be in the range 60 - 3600. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.3(1e) and later.
  - Default: `"60"`
* `violation_action` (violation) - (string) The violation action of the Port Security Interface Policy object.
  - Default: `"protect"`
  - Valid Values: `"protect"`.
* `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). Annotations can also be configured using a separate [aci_annotation](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/annotation) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  #### Required ####
  
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). Tags can also be configured using a separate [aci_tag](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/tag) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  #### Required ####
  
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.

## Importing

An existing Port Security Interface Policy can be [imported](https://www.terraform.io/docs/import/index.html) into this resource with its distinguished name (DN), via the following command:

```
terraform import aci_port_security_interface_policy.example uni/infra/portsecurityP-{name}
```

Starting in Terraform version 1.5, an existing Port Security Interface Policy can be imported
using [import blocks](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) via the following configuration:

```
import {
  id = "uni/infra/portsecurityP-{name}"
  to = aci_port_security_interface_policy.example
}
```
